actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: To amend the Black Lung Benefits Act to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Black Lung Benefits Act of 1969 to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act with respect to black lung claims filed after December 31, 1973.

titles.title: To amend the Black Lung Benefits Act to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act.
